data.name: Alice
data.text:
memory lookups required per BSR operation: 每次BSR操作所需的内存查找
the reduced memory lookups required per BSR operation: 每次BSR操作所需的内存查找减少
the performance gained from the reduced memory lookups required per BSR operation: 性能提升受益于每次BSR操作所需的内存查找减少
对吗

post.text: 吐槽: NSDI 2019的文章"Eiffel: Efficient and Flexible Software Packet Scheduling"写得好烂, 好难理解啊! 大家帮忙看一下这句话是什么意思: "While BSR instruction is 8-32x faster than DIV [3], the performance gained from the reduced memory lookups required per BSR operation."
